https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kZWBJN2i1HfWCLrjwpUiDeXfPtt.jpg From a Distance: The Event is a live album by Cliff Richard, released in 1990 by EMI. The album was recorded in June 1989 at Richard's "The Event" concert, held at Wembley Stadium in London. Cliff Richard From a Distance: The Event
